title: New: Mac DeMarco – Passing Out Pieces
body:
That loveable dishevelled rogue Mac DeMarco is soon to release his third album of hazy lazy-day rock’n’roll jams.

_Salad Days_ is out April 1st on Captured Tracks but until then the first single, an introspective sauntering stroll through the Mac’s thoughts on living life in the public eye, entitled ‘Passing Out Pieces’ will have to suffice.

\[soundcloud url=”https://api.soundcloud.com/tracks/129507506″ params=”color=ff6600&auto\_play=false&show\_artwork=true” width=”100%” height=”166″ iframe=”true” /\]
